verbs.description: [ARG1: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: arrived] [ARG4: in Beijing] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , [C-ARG4: where he will likely brief Chinese President Xi Jinping on his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump last week] , [ARGM-TMP: as Washington and Seoul agreed to suspend a major joint military exercise] .

North Korean leader Kim Jong Un arrived in Beijing on Tuesday , where he [V: will] likely brief Chinese President Xi Jinping on his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump last week , as Washington and Seoul agreed to suspend a major joint military exercise .

North Korean leader Kim Jong Un arrived in Beijing on Tuesday , where he will likely brief [ARG0: Chinese President Xi] [V: Jinping] on his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump last week , as Washington and Seoul agreed to suspend a major joint military exercise .

North Korean leader Kim Jong Un arrived in Beijing on Tuesday , where he will likely brief Chinese President Xi Jinping on his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump last week , as [ARG0: Washington and Seoul] [V: agreed] [ARG1: to suspend a major joint military exercise] .

North Korean leader Kim Jong Un arrived in Beijing on Tuesday , where he will likely brief Chinese President Xi Jinping on his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump last week , as [ARG0: Washington and Seoul] agreed to [V: suspend] [ARG1: a major joint military exercise] .
